text: Kaala Saaya is a Hindi language Indian television series that airs on Sahara One. The series stars Mamik Singh and Aaliya Shah who investigate and try to solve several mysterious deaths. The series is premiered on 24 January 2011 and is produced by Sunil Agnihotri. ==Cast== *Mamik Singh as Officer Ranveer *Natasha Sinha as Misses Malhotra *Vinod Kapoor as Mr. Malhotra *Shiva Rindani as Father D'Cunha *Aaliya Shah as Aaliya *Anwar Fatehan *Yash Balani *Reema Debnath as Church Nun *Vindu Dara Singh as Rajeev Saxena ==See also== * List of Hindi horror shows ==References== ==External links== *Kaala Saaya Official Site on Sahara One Category:Sahara One original programming Category:Indian horror fiction television series Category:2011 Indian television series debuts Category:2011 Indian television series endings
title: Kaala Saaya
